selections.name: Unodostrescuatro
selections.reason: Consistent performer who has placed in last two starts. Drawn perfectly in barrier 5 to get a soft run. The one to beat.

selections.name: Navy Dreams
selections.reason: Comes out of a Listed race at Ellerslie. Massive class drop here and drawn to do no work.

selections.name: Sarracina
selections.reason: Finished 2nd at this track and distance last start. Proven ability to handle the conditions.

selections.name: Bertie Wooster
selections.reason: Consistent type who is rarely far away. Solid place chance again.

danger_horse.name: Navy Dreams
danger_horse.reason: The class drop from Listed company to Maiden is significant.

selections.name: Roaring Bebe
selections.reason: Excellent 2nd last start at Ellerslie. Drawn ideally in barrier 2 to control the race.

selections.name: Deep Pursuit
selections.reason: Narrowly beaten into 2nd last start. Consistent form and fits well here.

selections.name: Marie Antoinette
selections.reason: Expensive yearling from top stable. Trials have been solid. Watch market.

selections.name: Rybakina
selections.reason: Solid 4th on debut. Natural improvement expected.

danger_horse.name: Deep Pursuit
danger_horse.reason: Knocking on the door and brings strong recent form numbers.

selections.name: Stay Frosty
selections.reason: Just missed on debut finishing 2nd. The form horse of the race and should go one better.

selections.name: Ayumi
selections.reason: Resumed with a solid 3rd. Strips fitter and has shown ability in better company.

selections.name: Pure Lotus
selections.reason: Consistent placer who maps well from barrier 5.

selections.name: Silky Shuba
selections.reason: Drawn well and has been competitive in similar fields.

danger_horse.name: Ayumi
danger_horse.reason: Has Group race experience as a 2yo. Class runner.

selections.name: Precipice
selections.reason: Impressive maiden winner two starts back. Forgive last run on slow track. Can bounce back.

selections.name: Scolera
selections.reason: Runner-up in last two starts. Very consistent and deserves a win.

selections.name: Zivou
selections.reason: Won maiden with authority last start. Progressive type.

selections.name: Belle Noire
selections.reason: Consistent form and drawn well. Must include.

danger_horse.name: Scolera
danger_horse.reason: Honest campaigner who won't be far away.

selections.name: Frozen Fortune
selections.reason: Solid 5th on debut in a strong maiden. Drawn perfectly in barrier 4 to improve.

selections.name: Night Wolf
selections.reason: Emergency runner. If he gains a start, his 3rd placing last time puts him right in this.

selections.name: Miller's Point
selections.reason: Has shown ability but deals with a wide draw. Place chance.

selections.name: Seduire
selections.reason: 4th last start was encouraging. Another with a tricky gate.

danger_horse.name: Night Wolf
danger_horse.reason: Form is superior to most here if he gets a run.

selections.name: Petite Rocher
selections.reason: Just missed last start finishing 2nd. Drawn the rail (1) and looks the winner.

selections.name: Super Legocy
selections.reason: Placed 3rd last start. Has ability but must overcome the wide barrier.

selections.name: Fat Albert
selections.reason: Runner-up last time out. Consistent type.

selections.name: Adlerian
selections.reason: Resuming. Has shown enough in previous campaign to feature fresh.

danger_horse.name: Super Legocy
danger_horse.reason: If he can cross from the wide gate, he has the speed to win.

selections.name: Bethany Dee
selections.reason: Excellent 2nd last start. Drawn barrier 1 and gets top jockey Kennedy. Hard to beat.

selections.name: Virgo Viva
selections.reason: Drops significantly in class from a Group 3. Drawn well.

selections.name: Starlit Express
selections.reason: Won maiden well last start. Up in grade but has upside.

selections.name: Gallinda
selections.reason: Another last start winner. Confidence is high.

danger_horse.name: Virgo Viva
danger_horse.reason: Class runner of the field dropping back to BM65.

selections.name: Incredible Patch
selections.reason: Great run for 2nd last start. Drawn barrier 2 which is a huge advantage over rivals.

selections.name: Flashback
selections.reason: Runner-up last start. Has the ability but the wide draw (17) is a major hurdle.

selections.name: Pilates
selections.reason: Placed last start. Another contender compromised by a terrible draw.

selections.name: Night Wolf
selections.reason: Dual acceptor. If running here, has strong claims despite the draw.

danger_horse.name: Flashback
danger_horse.reason: Talented but will need a lot of luck from the car park draw.

selections.name: Roccadonna
selections.reason: 3rd last start and drawn perfectly in barrier 6. Maps to get the run of the race.

selections.name: Bak De Ace
selections.reason: Runner-up last start. Has the form but barrier 14 makes it tricky.

selections.name: Djibouti
selections.reason: 2nd last start. Another top chance hurt by a wide barrier.

selections.name: Requisite
selections.reason: Solid 3rd last time out. In the mix.

danger_horse.name: Bak De Ace
danger_horse.reason: Consistent form, just needs luck in running.
